title: The Ukraine Debate / Life on Mars | Daily Best of April 7 | Rick & Bubba
description:
A caller gets heated with Bubba as we try to find clarity and get to the facts about the war in Ukraine. The next caller insists that he has proof of life on Mars. And, a woman gets tased in a Florida Wal-Mart. So, pretty big day on the show.
